game.name: art of rally
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 랠리의 황금기를 직접 경험해보세요. 1960년대 부터 1980년대 그룹 B 차량들 중 당신이 타고 싶은 차를 골라서 실제 장소에 영감을 받아 만든 스테이지들을 질주해보세요. 당신은 아트 오브 랠리의 고수가 될 수 있을까요? 한 번 시도해보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Race in the golden era of rally. Drive iconic cars from the 60s to Group B on challenging stages through stylized environments inspired by real worldwide locations. Will you master the art of rally?

reviewHighlights.text: tldr: Steep learning curve at the beginning, but it gets super incredibly once you're clicked with the handling. I personally am not experienced in ra...
The Art of Rally combines a timeless art style, good physics, and a genuine passion for rally to create one of the best racing games of all time. It's...
